comments:
Description:
Error in parameter dialog when preview a report containing dynamic parameter.

Build: 20061108

Steps to reproduce:
1. New data source and dataset
2. New a dynamic parameter based on the dataset.
3. Preview the report

expected result:
Correct parameter dialog.

Actuaul result:
See attached screen shot

Please see the log:

----- Root Cause -----
